title: account
body: so I forgot my account email and so I can't reset my password if any one wants to help I would appreciate it.

replies.body: Your best bet would be to hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so that we can help you out there. I can't give out personal info here on the boards, but they'll be able to go over all of that with you in your ticket.
